name: PARTY ON!
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 46 in 72 hours.

In PARTY ON! you are a employee of a club, where your task is to keep the party alive. You do this by playing music and keeping the guests satisfied.

The club is open from 1 AM to 6 AM, so
don't let the party die out, your job is on the line!

The game also features a Endless mode, if you just can't get enough of partying!

PARTY ON!
